${ModID}:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
${ModID}:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL starlight:Tag_Team: Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight
${ModID}:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL starlight:Project the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${ModID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, NL gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${ModID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL starlight:Tag_Team: Gain !M! starlight:SP.

${ModID}:Protect.NAME: Protect
${ModID}:Protect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Quake.NAME: Quake
${ModID}:Quake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Reduce this card's cost by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Shell.NAME: Shell
${ModID}:Shell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:Thunder.NAME: Thunder
${ModID}:Thunder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
